author: Matt
title: Welcome
content:
Hello there!
Welcome to my very first blog website created with Flask!

author: Matt
title: Generate ID Bug
content: so new_id = len(blog_posts) + 1 doesnt work so well

author: Matt
title: ID bug fixed
content: I've fixed the ID bug by adding nanoseconds and a random integer! The chance of that being the same twice is Slim! I hope. :)

author: Matt
title: Annoying like and dislike Refresh
content: I have a problem with scrolling down to the bottom of the page clicking like or dislike and it refreshes my page and brings me back to the top. we are going to fix this!!
